workshop.title: Data Science Acceleration
workshop.description: Learn how to use R environment with Oracle Big Data Cloud Service - Compute Edition and Oracle Storage Cloud Object Store

labs.title: Read Me First
labs.description: Overview of the Data Science Acceleration User Journey

labs.title: Lab 100: Trial Account Signup
labs.description: Instructions to sign-up for a free trial of Oracle Public Cloud services

labs.title: Lab 100GSE: ALTERNATE VERSION
labs.description: Oracle Employee/Partner instructions to get access to a GSE/demo.oracle.com Oracle Public Cloud demo environment

labs.title: Lab 200: Setup R and BDCS-CE
labs.description: Provision and configure R environment and RStudio Server with Orace Big Data Cloud Service - Compute Edition (BDCS-CE)

labs.title: Lab 300: Analyze Data with R
labs.description: Use R, Rstudio Server, BDCS-CE and Oracle Storage Cloud Object Store to analyze data and store results

labs.title: Lab 400: More R and Object Store
labs.description: Download, install, and use R package to simplify working with the Oracle Storage Cloud Object Store

labs.title: Cleanup
labs.description: Instructions to cleanup your cloud service environment.
